SELECT c.PRDNO AS prdNo, p.PRDNAME AS prdName, p.PRDPRICE AS prdPrice, p.PRDIMG AS prdImg, c.SALES AS sales, c.RANK_NO AS rankNo FROM PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE c JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRDNO = c.PRDNO WHERE c.RANK_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE)
AND c.CATEGORY LIKE CONCAT(#{category}, '%')
ORDER BY c.RANK_NO FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT c.PRDNO AS prdNo, p.PRDNAME AS prdName, p.PRDPRICE AS prdPrice, p.PRDIMG AS prdImg, c.SALES AS sales, c.RANK_NO AS rankNo FROM PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE c JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRDNO = c.PRDNO WHERE c.RANK_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND c.SKIN_TYPE = #{skinType} ORDER BY c.RANK_NO FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY

SELECT c.PRDNO AS prdNo, p.PRDNAME AS prdName, p.PRDPRICE AS prdPrice, p.PRDIMG AS prdImg, c.SALES AS sales, c.RANK_NO AS rankNo FROM PRODUCT_RANKING_CACHE c JOIN PRODUCT p ON p.PRDNO = c.PRDNO WHERE c.RANK_DATE = TRUNC(SYSDATE) AND c.SKIN_TYPE = 'ALL' ORDER BY c.RANK_NO FETCH FIRST #{limit} ROWS ONLY
